original_text: When the sun was going down, people in the town brought to Jesus all those people who were ill. They had many different kinds of illness. Jesus put his hands on each ill person and they became well again.
korean_text: 해 질 무렵에 사람들이 온갖 병자들을 데리고 나아오매 예수께서 일일이 그 위에 손을 얹으사 고치시니

sentences.original_text: When the sun was going down
people in the town brought to Jesus
all those people who were ill
They had many different kinds of illness
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 여러 종류의 병을 가지고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: Jesus put his hands on each ill person
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님께서는 각 아픈 사람에게 손을 얹으시고
